name: Baked lemon-herb chicken with quinoa and broccoli
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Season chicken breasts with lemon juice and herbs.
Bake chicken for 25-30 minutes until cooked through.
Cook quinoa as per package instructions.
Steam broccoli until tender.
Serve the chicken with quinoa and broccoli.

name: Grilled salmon with sweet potatoes and asparagus
directions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with olive oil and salt.
Grill salmon for 5-7 minutes per side.
Peel and chop sweet potatoes, then roast at 400°F for 25 minutes.
Grill asparagus for 5-7 minutes.
Serve salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and grilled asparagus.

name: Chickpea vegetable curry with rice
directions: Cook rice as per package instructions.
In a pan, sauté carrots and peas until tender.
Add chickpeas, spinach, and coconut milk.
Stir in curry powder and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve curry with rice.

name: Lentil bolognese with pasta and zucchini
directions: Cook pasta as per package instructions.
In a pan, sauté onion and zucchini.
Add lentils and crushed tomatoes, simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the bolognese over pasta.
